name: 🌁 Mirage Expanse
description: Illusions shift with every step. Is it real treasure or just a trick?

name: 🧿 Oracle's Peak
description: Visions flood your mind. You may find knowledge — or go mad.

name: 🧊 Glacial Abyss
description: Sub-zero temperatures slow your every move. But riches lie frozen below.

name: 🛕 Ruined Temple
description: Long-abandoned relics rest beneath crumbling stone. Some are still guarded.

name: 🪩 Phantom Ballroom
description: Music plays from nowhere. You dance or you die — or maybe both.

name: 🛸 Crash Site Delta-9
description: Twisted metal, alien fluids, and unknown tech cover the crater.

name: 🕊️ Silent Chapel
description: Time feels frozen. It’s peaceful... too peaceful.

name: 🎒 Forgotten Camp
description: Whoever was here left in a hurry. Supplies still remain.

name: 🌌 Astral Verge
description: Stars bend and reality thins. Loot seems to find you here... somehow.

name: 🔮 Veiled Bazaar
description: Traders of strange goods appear and vanish. If you're fast, you score big.

name: 🪐 Orbital Drop Zone
description: Cargo pods slam into the ground, scattering gear in all directions.

name: ⚰️ Grave of Giants
description: Bones the size of trees lie half-buried. Their hoards may still remain.

name: 🎢 Broken Theme Park
description: Rusted rides creak in the wind. Prizes and danger are both easy to find.

name: 🔥 Scorched Hollow
description: Recently burned, but embers still glow around exposed valuables.

name: 💀 Execution Grounds
description: Blood stains the soil. The cursed dead may guard lost gear.

name: 🌿 Overgrown Lab
description: Plants have claimed everything — including rare experiments and devices.

name: ⛺ Hermit's Refuge
description: A lone camp surrounded by mystery. Someone left in a hurry.

name: 🧨 Sabotaged Mine
description: Tunnels rattle with collapsing stone, but minerals and gear are buried deep.

name: 🎯 Hunter’s Arena
description: Signs of past duels mark the land. Great for combat and trophies.

name: 🌀 Dimensional Fold
description: This place shouldn't exist. Time and space ripple. Rewards are unstable.

name: 🕹️ Glitched Arcade
description: Reality stutters here. Loot may duplicate — or vanish.

name: 🌧️ Thunder Marsh
description: The rain never stops. Flash floods sometimes unearth hidden caches.

name: ⚙️ Clockwork Courtyard
description: A forgotten automaton garden ticks endlessly, concealing buried valuables.

name: 🏛️ Shattered Forum
description: Crumbling statues whisper old debates. Hidden vaults lie beneath the rubble.

name: 🧱 Crumbling Asylum
description: Madness lingers in the halls. But so do supplies left behind.

name: 🛰️ Signal Relay
description: Buzzing transmissions and strange noises echo — and attract scavengers.

name: 🐾 Predator's Trail
description: Fresh claw marks suggest you're not alone. Tread carefully, loot swiftly.

name: 🧵 Tattered Market
description: Once a lively trade hub, now ruins littered with forgotten wares.

name: 🪦 Burial Mounds
description: Earthen graves dot the land. Disturb them and you may find riches... or curses.

name: 🌠 Falling Star Crater
description: The ground is warm and glowing. Whatever landed brought treasure with it.

name: 🧨 Explosive Alley
description: Traps everywhere. Everything explodes. Still worth the risk?

name: 🌀 Unstable Rift
description: Nothing stays the same here. Stats swing wildly each visit.

name: 🎭 Trickster's Domain
description: Everything lies. Expect the unexpected — and then something else.

name: 📡 Distortion Field
description: Your senses betray you. Time feels broken. Loot seems to shift location.

name: 🔁 Paradox Loop
description: You're sure you've been here before... and after. It messes with your mind.

name: 👁️ Hall of Echoes
description: Voices bounce back louder than your thoughts. Confusing, but full of surprises.

name: 💫 Twisting Spire
description: A vertical maze of teleport pads and hidden alcoves.

name: 🃏 Joker’s Wild
description: This place plays tricks with fate. Great gains — or great losses.

name: 🎇 Volatile Nexus
description: Energy surges wildly here. It powers up loot — and chaos.

name: 🌻 Quiet Meadow
description: A calm, grassy field where birds chirp and the air is fresh.

name: 🌲 Pine Thicket
description: Thick with evergreen trees and hidden nooks.

name: 🏖️ Sandy Shore
description: Gentle waves lap against the shore. Sometimes, the tide brings useful items.

name: 🌾 Farmland Fringe
description: Overgrown fields with the occasional forgotten stash.

name: 🏡 Rural Homestead
description: A small house and barn, left in a hurry but full of supplies.

name: 🚰 Water Pump Station
description: Abandoned, but still functional. Good place to refresh.

name: 🌉 Covered Bridge
description: A shaded wooden bridge with secret compartments in the beams.

name: 🚜 Tractor Lot
description: Old machinery rusts in place — but toolboxes are still full.

name: 🌳 Orchard Path
description: Fruit-bearing trees stretch for miles, with surprises tucked away in crates.

name: 🪵 Lumberyard Edge
description: Chopped logs, equipment, and forgotten gear tucked in the sawdust.

name: 🦉 Owl's Perch
description: A quiet canopy lookout. Peaceful, with occasional glints of hidden loot.

name: 🍄 Mushroom Glade
description: Bioluminescent fungi light the area. Some are edible, others... valuable.

name: 🏞️ Valley Crossing
description: A natural junction where travelers once passed. Loot still lingers.

name: 🧺 Picnic Grounds
description: Old tables and benches, some still holding forgotten supplies.

name: 🏕️ Scout Camp
description: A circle of tents, long since abandoned. Gear might still be usable.

name: 🌬️ Breezy Hill
description: A windswept rise with a wide view and a few supply caches tucked in.

name: 🚶 Trailhead Post
description: A wooden sign and a supply box mark where many journeys once began.

name: 🛶 Driftwood Shore
description: Piles of water-worn debris and the occasional crate bobbing on the waves.

name: 🏔️ Snowcap Ridge
description: Cold but calm. Sheltered crevices often hide survival gear.

name: 🛤️ Abandoned Rail
description: A quiet rail line rusting into history, with forgotten cargo along the way.

name: 🦌 Forest Edge
description: The boundary of the wild woods, often visited by animals and wanderers alike.

name: 🏚️ Barn Ruins
description: Once a shelter for livestock, now home to hidden stashes.

name: 🌉 Cliff Overlook
description: A scenic vista offering solitude and the occasional traveler’s cache.

name: 🧱 Construction Site
description: Stacks of materials, scattered tools, and lots of places to scavenge.

name: ⛲ Fountain Plaza
description: A cracked fountain and old benches — a peaceful if worn-out rest stop.

name: 📦 Storage Depot
description: A cluster of half-open containers, filled with all sorts of leftover goods.

name: 🧺 Overgrown Courtyard
description: Stone paths and crumbled walls now blanketed in vines and moss.

name: 🚦 Forgotten Intersection
description: Street signs rusting in place, but the old cars may still hold valuables.

name: 🎣 Fisherman’s Dock
description: Still waters and broken boats. Lines and lures left behind.

name: 📚 Library Ruins
description: Torn books and dusty archives — and sometimes useful gear.

name: 🪖 Old War Trench
description: A dugout from a long-past battle. There’s still salvage in the mud.

name: 🛎️ Deserted Inn
description: Dusty beds and creaky floors, but useful things hide in drawers.

name: 🧽 Flooded Alley
description: Shin-deep water and slippery bricks. Filthy, but rich with sunken goods.

name: 🚧 Collapsed Tunnel
description: Rubble blocks most of it — except one dangerous path lined with crates.

name: 🍂 Autumn Grove
description: A calm, colorful forest carpeted in fallen leaves and forgotten gear.

name: 🔩 Scrapyard Flats
description: Rusty junk stretches to the horizon. Great for parts and tools.

name: 🛎️ Rooftop Garden
description: Overgrown veggies and broken furniture — surprisingly restful and full of odds and ends.

name: 📻 Signal Tower
description: An old broadcast station full of wires, lockers, and surprises.

name: 🪚 Logging Trail
description: Stacks of timber and dropped toolkits left behind by hurried workers.

name: 📮 Courier's Post
description: Satchels and packages still wait inside this abandoned outpost.
